title: Welcome
content: I have created this simple app as a way for people to create and share slides on DAT. The idea in my mind is that this or an app like this could be a good way to share and distribute slide decks used at conferences and gatherings.

title: How to use?
content: Simply fork this website in Beaker browser and edit the slides.json file. To add additional slides copy one of blocks as shown in the screenshot on the next slide

title: Slide Templates
content: There are three slide templates at present Splash, Basic and Photo. Splash just has a title centered vertically and horizontally. Basic has a title centered at the top of page and body text underneath. Photo has a title centered at the top with space for an image underneath.

title: The Code
content: The code can be found on Github in the link below. This is pretty basic at present and I do have plans to add a few more features and some more templates to give this some more flexibility over the next weeks.
